name: Ananya Sharma
review: Little Lemon is my go-to spot! The Mediterranean flavors are so authentic and comforting. The ambiance is just perfect too!

name: Ravi Mehta
review: Great food and lovely service. The hummus was top-notch. I just wish the waiting time was a little shorter.

name: Neha Kulkarni
review: Absolutely loved it! The lemon-infused desserts are a must-try. Perfect place for a weekend dinner.

name: Aditya Verma
review: The food was decent but not mind-blowing. Still, a good place to catch up with friends in a cozy environment.

name: Priya Nair
review: Super fresh ingredients and a modern twist on traditional recipes. I love how they keep the menu exciting!

name: Karan Singh
review: Exceptional service and the lamb shawarma was heavenly. Highly recommended for food lovers!

name: Meera Joshi
review: A lovely little spot. The decor is charming, and the staff is very courteous.

name: Siddharth Rao
review: Great atmosphere and the mezze platter is unbeatable. Will definitely be coming back!

name: Ishita Kapoor
review: Five stars for flavor, service, and presentation. Every dish was a piece of art!

name: Aman Desai
review: Food was okay, but the seating was a bit cramped. Still a decent experience overall.
